title: TechSchool
description: A comprehensive web-based e-learning platform developed using the MERN Stack. It features video tutorials with a review & rating system, practice quizzes, a code editor, downloadable notes/cheatsheets, and a chatbot for user support.

title: Digital Menu
description: A dynamic digital menu platform built with the MERN stack for restaurants, hotels, and cafes. It offers a categorized item listing, advanced filtering based on food type, and a fully functional admin panel with CRUD operations for seamless menu management.

title: News Website
description: A full-stack news website powered by the MERN stack, integrated with a News API. It delivers real-time news updates across various categories, including general, entertainment, science, sports, and politics, with an infinite scrolling feature for seamless browsing.

title: Weather App
description: A real-time weather application developed using React.js and the OpenWeather API. Users can search for any city to view detailed weather metrics, including temperature, cloudiness, humidity, wind speed, and visibility, in an elegant and user-friendly interface.

title: FitClub
description: A React-based frontend website built to enhance the online presence of gyms. It effectively showcases services, enables user engagement, and provides an intuitive interface for potential customers.

title: Spotify Clone
description: A visually appealing Spotify clone designed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It delivers a seamless music experience with an optimized, responsive, and modern user interface, featuring an interactive music bar and categorized songs by artist.
